content: गायत्री {@--1@} A Vedic metre of 24 syllables; गायत्री छंदसामहं <ls>Bg. 10. 35.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a very sacred verse repeated by every Brāhmaṇa at his Saṃdhyā (morning and evening devotions) and on other occasions also. Great sins even are said to be expiated by a pious repetition of this verse, which is as follows: --तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यं भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि धियो यो न प्रचोदयात् <ls>Rv. 3. 62. 10.</ls> --त्रं A hymn composed and recited in the Gāyatrī metre.
